title: एक निर्वाचन क्षेत्र में 100 से ज्यादा प्रत्याशी हुए तो बैलेट पेपर से चुनाव? तथ्य-जांच
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: 1/2: It has come to the notice of ECI that misinformation is being spread on social media that Election Commission EVMs cannot be used if the number of candidates exceed 100. Latest EVMs can take upto 384 candidates including NOTA. Wherever required those EVMs will be deployed pic.twitter.com/g3GutHWwG5
